website_summaries.verdict: Men who dislike the feel of a  thong between their toes should consider these slide-on shower shoes.
pros: Slides into each other for space savings in gym bag

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Inexpensive. Traction/Grip. Get a pair!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, inexpensive, comfortable, and a great non-slip shoe that is now one of my all time favorites for use around the house or for running daily errands. I also bought a pair for my 97-years old grandmother and she loves the slipper! She loves the fact that the slipper offers traction and she’s reassured that she won’t slip and fall. That makes me happy!🤠 Great product and design.
customer_reviews.author: AK-47

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Problem - Updated
customer_reviews.text: If you have the larger size feet (11/12) they will likely be too small. After my request for return, the seller contacted me to offer to ship me the next size for free. They also said to give the smaller ones to charity. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five days and they're coming apart.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on April 5 and they're coming apart on April 10. I was willing to let it go that my left heel is forced over to the side at the heel so that it overlaps the inside edge of the sandal instead of sitting centered in the heel bed of it, but this latest defect has me here tonight leaving a review of one star. The shoe bed lining is detaching from the bottom as shown. LESS THAN A WEEK. REALLLY????
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Vertico sandals to use in a health club shower. The size 10-11 fit my size 10 feet nicely (see photo). My size 10-11 sandals are marked "44" on the bottom, European sizing. The one-piece sandals are constructed from lightweight stiff, yet slightly flexible foam rubber. The retaining straps fit my foot perfectly. The sandals are good for shower, inside home, or beach use.
customer_reviews.author: Ineedcoffee

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are smaller than listed size.  Vendor doesn't accept returns!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are smaller than listed size. for comparison in photo - the same size by Crocs. Additionally, the gray insole shoes have a protruding rim so your foot fits in like in kayak. Lost money on this useless product. Vendor doesn't accept returns!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Good sandals for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Good sandals for the gym. I don't wear these very long, just when showering at the gym, but they are holding up well. They are not extremely comfortable, like no memory foam feel like some sandals but they are not uncomfortable either. I have had them for about 6 months, no cracking or signs of wear. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scooterpants

customer_reviews.title: Very light but sturdy, and very supportive as well
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional value! Very light but sturdy, and very supportive as well. Very well made product that dries quickly. Put them in your gym bag and use them at the showers at your fitness facility. (I bought these because I'm getting over a bad case of Athlete's Foot that I believe I acquired at my fitness club.) They're also terrific for light yard work; you can clean them easily with the hose, and they will dry very quickly. I love the comfort of the open-air design for the toes. I have tried many much more expensive brands of similar sandals, and these are the best overall by far. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Impressive footwear, less than 22 grams weight for Backpacking!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them by mistake! However they arrived and weight only 22 grams (21.74gm). I put my crocks on the scale (over 10-years old) and they weighed in at 24.50 grams. I will be taking these as my second pair of shoes for backpacking - the weight is not the only reason thought - they are more comfortable than crocks and I feel walking around towns during resupply while my boots are airing out will be much more comfortable... As for shower shoes they are non-slip and fit my feet well. Quite an impressive product for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: jumper

customer_reviews.title: No slip! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great...no slipping on virtually any surface. I have hardwood and vinyl floor...I even tried it in the shower! No slipping! THIS IS THE ONE! They're made from a soft foam like plastic, no smells no sharp edges, very flexible. Bought in July..here I am at the end of August and the look like new! I wear them near daily as morning slippers, sometimes take the dog out across the street and these inexpensive sandals look unmarked! I'm not overly aggressive with shoes but I am surprised something so inexpensive as turned out so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Might be good sandals, but  I can't tell because they are much too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 shoe. I bought these in 9/10. They might fit someone who uses size 9, but they might be a little small even then. The seller needs to fix this. It's difficult to overstate the importance of providing accurate sizing; their business depends on it. I was going to return them, but it's too much of a hassle -All the more reason to provide accurate information. 1/5 for failing to provide as described.
customer_reviews.author: CCCYakima

customer_reviews.title: Solid made - this is the shower shoe to own
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use as shower shoes. They do what I wanted. They're well constructed, solid, and don't have any of those flimsy joints that is likely to break like many shower shoes. They have a solid grip on the bottom and are very easy to slide off and on, hands free. They're comfortable for the short time I wear them and definitely do their job. The only minor complaint is they're concave so they fill with water, requiring you to tip your feet when you're done showering to empty the swimming pool that has collected in them, but that's pretty minor and I'm definitely not looking for another shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Malice

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago I bought these exact same sandals and was very satisfied with fit and comfort. Ordered the same for an extra pair. The new pair (Same size as my old ones) is too small and tight on all sides. It’s hard to see in the photos and no they didn’t get so much larger and roomier by wearing them. Since there’s a return shipping fee $3.50 for a 12.99 item decided to keep and donate. Good lesson not to buy anything from third party sellers on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ardal

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing these almost all day inside, my feet need an arch support to keep them from being painful, these are working out great, I am a male 6' 200 lbs, I wear a size 11 and these are 11/12 and fit just right, the inside has a nice arch support and a raised ridge around the edges that help hold your foot from sliding around, easy on and off. You could were these out and about but I don't think they would hold up to rough ground or rock or dirt etc. or your mile long walks. I paid $13.99on Amazon and very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.  Comfortable, easy sandal.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 12 1/2 shoe and ordered the 12-13 size (EU 46). The fit for me is just right, but I have wide feet. These are initial impressions and might change, but very comfortable right out of the box. Enough room to slide on easily, but they stay on while walking. Some initial odor, but the included tag indicates that the smell will go away after a couple wearings. Update after a few weeks: still 5 stars and since it's summer, the only thing I wear on my feet most of the time. Shoes come off and these go on as soon as possible. Just enough arch support, just enough strap area, just enough heel cup.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Nice for shower or house shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy, and much safer to walk in than flip flops. They stay on the foot much better. I did try them out in the shower and they worked but they took a little while to dry out, more than flip flops. Safety in walking is big for me. They suit there! They are serviceable. Maybe if they came in other colors like red for instance, they might be a little prettier. But they are water resistant, comfortable to wear, sure footed relatively speaking, and fit great. I only took off a point because I don’t think they are very pretty. But they do the job, and they seem of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these shoes for one day but I can already tell they're a keeper. They seem to be of good quality and are lightweight. They fit pretty well considering a listed size actually covers two sizes. I first purchased the 9-10 (I wear a 10) only to find they run small. I ordered the 10-11 size and they fit but are closer to snug size 10 rather than an 11. I was hoping for a little looser fit as I wear socks with mine and slip them on to take the trash out and such. They will most likely stretch some and be ok. All in all though, they will do the job. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for casual use
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a gym shower. The soles are pretty grippy so the traction is good and there is no fear of slipping. The fit is comfortable. I wear 10.5 running shoes (Asics, Puma, others) and based on other reviews opted for 11/12. I am glad I did because 0.5-1" smaller size would have been problematic. Somebody commented that there is no drainage and it is true. However, with somewhat relaxed fit it is easy to shake off the water that pools up in these shoes. Overall, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sensemaker

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong item the first time
customer_reviews.text: The first item I received did not match the picture and description and they were not the size I ordered. They were also very cheep. Not sure they did it on purpose or just a mistake on their part. No other reviews that I can find with this problem so I guess it was a mistake. I sent them back (no charge) and the replacement pair matched the description and picture. They fit OK and for shower shoes they work good for that. I would not use them for anything else but shower or pool shoes. No support at all and I do not believe they would last for general use.
customer_reviews.author: Napa Harp

customer_reviews.title: The price and the fit are just too perfect to pass on.
customer_reviews.text: When I sat saw them I didn't like them but I must say they have grown really fast on me. My fanning liked them right away. I truly like them very much. They are comfortable, the width is perfect, and they fit perfectly. Very comfortable when walking. There was one thing I didn't like, the Vertigo Logo on front popped out on both of them. Of course; I glued them back but it shouldn't have happened. That's the one star missing. Regardless; I recommend them with all my heart. The price, the comfortable fit, and the perfect width makes them the perfect companion for being around the house chilling.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just to wear in the shower at the gym, but once I tried them on I made them my main pair of flip flops. They’re just as easy to get on as any other similar sandal, but these feel more “secure”. When I walk up the stairs I don’t feel like there’s a potential for them to slide off. The traction is above average too. I was worried from the picture that the bands that go over the top of your foot would be flimsy, but that’s not the case at all. Also they’re pretty comfortable. My other pair was padded, and these are just as nice. Excellent sandals.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: MEN’S Shower Shoes (Not Women’s)
customer_reviews.text: Update: 06/06/2020 I’m giving these 1-star now because the right slide has the glue coming up. It’s annoying. I wore these for maybe 6 weeks - a total of 30 times - for maybe 30 total hours. ### 2-stars I’m giving these shower shoes 2 stars because they don’t have MENS in the title. I searched Womens and this came up - I didn’t think to double check. I can’t say if the fit is good but they look durable. Guess my size-5-women’s-shoe-wearing mother will just have to look the fool in these. Sorry, mom! #daughterFail
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Skyes

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is anyone's guess
customer_reviews.text: I originally had bought these sandals and really enjoyed them. Used them on a deployment and then left them in Poland on accident on vacation after. I was distraught so I bought another pair. Same size. But when they arrived they were MUCH smaller but still marked with the same size as I had ordered and bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Harrington sauer

customer_reviews.title: Size of shoes doesn't related to real size
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair of same shoes year ago and now ordered more in exact the same size: 12-13, but what was a surprise that I got the same showing size 12-13 (46), but shoes now made for this size with out sole in completely different size: previous shoes I bought in 2019 was 12"L x 4 3/4" W (in widest part), this shoes I got has out sole 11 1/2" L x 4 1/4" W.
customer_reviews.author: Inessa

customer_reviews.title: good shoe
customer_reviews.text: for the price, these are great for the gym. don't have to worry about them breaking like those "v, thing shaped" flip flops where it goes between your toes. nice slide shoe with very good grip in wet conditions (around the indoor pool, in the sauna, in the steam room), they do have a funky, plastic smell when you first get them, so what, put them outside for a day or two, walk around in them, boom, gone, not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quick-drying - exactly what you want for their purpose
customer_reviews.text: These won’t win any fashion contests, but for use in wet environments such as the shower or around a pool, they’re perfect. They don’t slide easily if you’re just walking/standing, they fit securely enough to not fall off but aren’t too snug, and they dry relatively quickly without absorbing any of the water. I’ve been using them almost daily while backpacking for the past 5 months and they’ve held up well during this use as well as being crammed into a full bag when traveling between stops. For the price, they seem to be durable and serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year for wearing around the house and love them. They lasted a year of daily wear before the logo and sole detached from the shoes. I tried gluing the sole back but that didn't work. So now I'm on amazon reordering a pair. It's worth for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Battle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great slide
customer_reviews.text: decided to stop wearing thong flipflops (was slipping off them lately ) tried a lot of slides but none were any better until I tried these super comfortable , nice and airy perfect fit (medium foot) true to size (don't slip off) where em outside in the yard and on the deck all summer -perfect didn't stretch don't wear em in the shower but wore em in the rain and no trouble with water collecting in the shoe just turn your foot down a little and water will run out easily
customer_reviews.author: chi_greg

customer_reviews.title: Decent Slip-ons, Run Small
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice slip-on sandals for the money, but they do run small, especially if you wear socks. I wear either a 9 or 9.5 shoe, so I purchased this sandal in size 9-10. They were just too small; I returned them and ordered the next size up. The size 10-11 were long enough, barely, but I still couldn't slip into them easily. I could force them on, but in just a few steps my feet would slide right out of them. So I give up; I'm sending them back and will look for something else. I'm sure these sandals will work well for some folks; they're just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Larry45

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn't fit....
customer_reviews.text: ...how can you rate it, anything other than 1 star. Honestly, I was pleased to find these at a bargain price of roughly $14. I normally wear an 11.5 to 12 (US sizing) so I ordered the largest size they had, 11/12. When I slipped them on I was surprised to see my toes were hanging over the front edge, even with my heel hanging off the back edge. To me these seem to be about a size 9.5-10. I checked the tag on the product to confirm it was sized at 11/12 and it certainly was. Just a heads up, if your shoe size is >11, these are likely not going to fit.
customer_reviews.author: ColoCruiser

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet, go up at least one size if not two.
customer_reviews.text: As for the product, they are suitable to task. I wanted something inexpensive that I could wear in the shower at the gym and they fit that bill. They feel a bit small for me. I am size 9.5 or 10 depending on the shoe, so I went with 10-11. But I think 11-12 might have been a better choice. It is not the length that seems to be the issue though, it is the width and I will confess that my feet are a little wider than average. So just bear that in mind when you make the purchase. As for the merchant, they are fantastic. Responsive and attentive!
customer_reviews.author: Seapanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who is normally a size 10 with a somewhat wide foot and high instep. He also has some achilles issues so likes an open heel. I bought the size 10-11 and they fit perfect. He loves them for quick bike rides and uses them at the indoor and outdoor pools as well as around the house and at the beach. They wash off nicely, dry quickly and are not too narrow or suffocating for his very picky feet. I am ordering another pair today as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Juan and Sara del

customer_reviews.title: I lucked out?
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was seeing a lot of ambivalence in the reviews about the sizing on these pool/shower shoes and opted for a slightly larger size than I ordinarily wear (11/12 instead of my usual 10/11). Well, these are an excellent fit --- maybe a bit larger than needed. So I guess the 10/11 would have worked as well. All other features are fine too. Seem durable and are nice looking for their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Fit good, comfortable and seem like they'll last
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of $50 Nike sandals like this. $50 is way too much to pay for a pair of flip flops though. Those lasted about 7 years. These are much less expensive and maybe not as well made but they are just fine in my opinion. They are very comfortable and they seem like they'll hold up well (time will tell). I like them and am very happy with them as a replacement. I am ordering a second pair to leave at the back door. I wouldn't be doing that with a $50 pair of Nikes!
customer_reviews.author: KBieb

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a pool sandal that's comfortable--even for indoors
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many sandals and clogs for inside or out by the pool, and these are the first ones (at a reasonable price, too) that are COMFORTABLE. I was skeptical about the ribbing on top, but that's what makes these comfortable. I use them by the pool because they don't soak water. And, because I have dry feet and have to use foot balm and wear socks all the time, even in summer, I use them around the house. I have nothing to do with this company but am so glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: DavidtheTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Slides with VERY SMOOTH SIDES
customer_reviews.text: These slides are very comfortable to wear. The one main downside is that it is very hard to run in, but that should be expected as you should not be wearing slides while running. Water will collect in the sandal should you be on level ground, however emptying it is as easy as tilting your foot forward. This also means it is very easy to clean your feet while wearing these. They work great as Shower Shoes, Poolside Shoes, Slippers, and other purposes. I would personally not recommend beaches as sand can get trapped, but rinsing out theses slides is very easy should you have access to a hose.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky L.

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: First, I like that the sandal fits and isn't sloppy to wear; second, although I've worn it just a short time, it is comfortable; third, the insole glued into it feels soft and easy on my feet. So far so good. Now, I'll see how it holds up as I wear it often, basically around the house. I wear a size 11 shoe, and ordered a size 11 sandal. It came marked 45, and it fit OK, but was a bit long. I kept it, but ordered a size 10, which fit better. Really like this sandal and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but cradles in the water
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy some sandles to utlize at the gym showers. The shoe is great for the shower but the only issue I have is that the sandel cradles on the water so your feet doesnt get the chance to dry at all.Your feet are always soaked. Ther is no drainge built into the sandle. So while your getting dressed, your feet have no chance to dry. Using a towel will only dry your feet so much. Hopefully, these will get updated to indude water drainage support.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: As a shower shoe, they work great. comfortable and fast drying. I'd say that if I intended to walk for longer periods, I might re-evaluate the review. They don't seem to have been designed for that purpose. For example, when I set the two shoes side by side, one is more upturned at the toes than the other. But for showering/short walking in wet environments, I think they hit the nail on the head here.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad for me.
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are very well designed ergonomically, they fit well and are comfortable to walk in for initial experience. But, after a little while, the material under my feet, felt like I'm walking on wet chewing gum. It was an annoying feeling and I had a hard time deciding if I should keep them for the comfort, or return them for the discomfort. So, i had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Romin Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Too small than size described
customer_reviews.text: The description says size US12 to US13 mens. These are maybe a mens US11 if not US10.5. They are too small. I have slippers in mens size US12 and US13 for comparison and they are noticeably larger than these. The size says 46 on these slippers which according to the size chart coincides with mens US12. But when compared to a mens US12, they are noticeably shorter. The design is good, but the size is off.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good fit, but not for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym, to wear in the locker room and shower. They are comfortable, seem durable, and the sizing in 10.5D are spot-on. The issue I have is that there's no drainage in the foot bed, and the foot bed is depressed so it's perfect for making pools of water in the center of the shoe. If it was more flat, or convex, or had drain holes, it would make showering with them on much better. As it is, they collect water, then track water and spill water. I'm still using them, and I have no plans to replace them, but I don't know that I'd purchase them again for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with Protection.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit pretty true to advertised size. I was really impressed by how lightweight and comfortable they are. They also seem to stay in place well on my feet. Some reviewers commented that they do not drain water adequately - yes, they do collect some water in the shower but merely tilting your foot up a bit dumps out the water (so this is not at all an issue for me). Price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tuggy

customer_reviews.title: Works for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet [6E], and I was concerned that these might not be wide enough. So far, they are doing well. My shoe size is 11, so I ordered the 11/12 sandal size. It is possible that a larger size would have been a slightly better fit. These sandals have a little bit of arch support, which I appreciate. A little more of that support would have been still better. For price and quality, I am pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Affordable Pool Shoes
customer_reviews.text: While these don't have some fancy logo on them, these sandals are very functional for my needs. I use them so I don't catch athletes feet at my fitness center pool and showers. They also make sure you don't slip and fall poolside and in the shower room. I've forgotten to wear them a couple of times and almost cracked my skull. They're a bargain for what they do.
customer_reviews.author: TXChainsawKiller

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for a couple years and counting
customer_reviews.text: I wear these in the shower sometimes, but I mostly just use them for walking around the house (I have hard floors so I'd rather not go barefoot). I've had them for about 2.5 years now, and they're quite comfortable. A few months ago I noticed that the right shoe has developed a deep tear in the sole, right by where the strap joins the sole near the big toe. But it doesn't really affect the usability of the shoe, so I'm just ignoring it for now. I'll probably buy another pair once these finally wear out.

customer_reviews.title: Sandals for someone who doesn't like sandals
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of sandals to walk out to the pool. I hate flip-flops. Most sandals bother my feet, feeling too plasticy or sticky to the bottom of my feet. These are great. They're comfortable. I can vacuum the pool with them on. They float so if they fall in, I don't have to go diving to find them. They protect my feet from the random rocks and stuff in the grass, but can slip on and off easily enough. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great, but had to return first pair for larger size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some older shower shoes that worked perfectly, and had lasted many years. But alas, the time had come for new ones. I had been on the lookout for replacements for some time and when I saw these, I went for them. I wear a U.S. size 11, so I ordered the 11-12 size. I liked them, but they seemed just a tad short. Before returning the 11-12s, I ordered another pair in size 12-13, to compare. The 12-13 size fit my size 11 feet perfectly. I returned the size 11-12s and ordered two additional pairs of the 12-13s. Now I should be set for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Herget

customer_reviews.title: Amazon asks for reviews two days after receipt, not near enough time to establish a quality opinion
customer_reviews.text: The slides are good looking, and comfortable. I ordered my normal shoe size, however, my toes run slightly up on the front rim, and my heels run slightly up on the rear rim. So, order a size larger IMO. I am keeping them, and I will adjust my review later, IF they manage to last longer than a few weeks, as other reviews have sited. If they last reasonably well, I will order another pair the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Far

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals for the healthclub, showers, swimming pool...
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful sandal. Well made, perfect for use at the health club. I swim daily, and these are wonderful to use at the pool, the sauna, steam, jacuzzi, showers. Solidly made, it fits the foot well, especially if you have the right size. I wear 9 1/2, and got size 10, and they are just right. Strong and durable, I expect them to last me a long time. Fully satisfied with this purchase !!!
customer_reviews.author: Raj Dhawan

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for the money
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do for me what I need them for--provide foot protection in the sauna. But they are loose. The size is just right as far as length and width. The top of the shoe is way above my foot so they fit very loosely. That is okay for me just to walk into the sauna. If you wanted them to wear around more than that, then the loose fit would be a problem. It also depends on how thick your foot is. My foot is thin.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Graves

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this product really shocked me. Originally just wanted shower sandals for around the house. Very comfortable fit, and I find myself wearing them outside as well. Hard to believe for the price. I have spent $40-50 for sandals that are not nearly as comfortable as these.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Harbert

customer_reviews.title: *DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT: SERIOUS HEALTH HAZARD FROM TOXIC PLASTIC!"
customer_reviews.text: *DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT: SERIOUS HEALTH HAZARD FROM TOXIC PLASTIC!" I opened the package & was hit with what smelled like a chemical factory, like formaldehyde. I do not want anything that reeks of such toxins touching my body. Do an internet search for terms like, “plastic, smell, toxic” to learn what a serious health hazard such plastics pose. (There's a good online article from the *LA Times *: “That 'new shower curtain smell'? It's toxic, study says” -- and LOTS of others from reputable journalistic, academic and other sources.)
customer_reviews.author: JustARegularShopper

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are about a half size too small. The material they are made of does stretch some so I can squeeze my feet into them though. They are also very soft so I suspect they will not last long. They do provide some protection from the surface you are walking on but you can feel any irregularities in that surface. So walking on gravel can be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great shower shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use my pair at the gym for showering and around the pool. They are great. I would not recommend for long walks. My shoe size is a normal10.5 mens. I purchased the 11-12 rather than the 10-11 because of the many complaints of them being undersized. They are a little big on my bare feet. I wish I had purchased the 10-11's, however they still fit well enough so I am not returning them.
customer_reviews.author: DanP

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom slippers
customer_reviews.text: The brand name tag stickers came off after a couple days of wearing these, so the quality is probably questionable, but other than that these held pretty well. I've spent the entire summer wearing them around my house and the porch. They look too goofy to take to a beach, but they're pretty comfy to enjoy where no one can see you.
customer_reviews.author: OK777

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: They were much larger than I expected, both in width and length. The size 11 that I ordered was actually too big for my son who wears a 12. We returned them since we had no use for them, and since I couldn't "guess" what size I would need to actually fit, I bought something else. They seemed well made however. If they fit I'd have liked them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: These shrink in really hot climates
customer_reviews.text: Know that if you live in a really hot climate (I'm in the Arizona desert) and leave these in the sun, they will shrink. Discovered this by accident, so I passed my pair to my son and ordered the next larger size. When those arrived, yup, I set them in the sun for a few hours to shrink one size. Perfect! Great product, comfortable and prevents slipping as well as any sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jr in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, but comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit comfortably and best of all don't have those bothersome 'between the toes' straps that so many others sandals have. They have good grip with a simple tread pattern and prevent slipping. I also had a problem with some sandals (without the strap between the toes) trying to turn sideways on my feet when walking - these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack from TX

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't really care to have a brand logo on my slides, so I picked these up while ordering some Nike slides for my son. His Nike slides have fallen apart and I had to order another set. My Vertico slides are still in great shape. The footbed is well formed and soft enough to be comfortable right out of the box. Glad I got these inexpensive ones because I'm out $80 for brand name crap for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: tdell

customer_reviews.title: Vertico Women's Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable slip on shoes. I wear them when I go outside on the patio, or down to the basement or to the back deck etc. They are quick to slip in and out of and they don't slide all over the place. The tread is pretty amazing. They are very lightweight, and have a cushion on them that I really wasn't expecting. For the price I paid, I thought I would get cheap quality, but these are an incredible buy! I recommend these sandals to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: HonestLor

customer_reviews.title: I love these no slip shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have a slick tile in my shower and hate having those mats down that just make a mess underneath them. These have great grip on them, no sliding at all. They fit like they were supposed to. I'm a size 8 show and I got the 8/9. I would buy them again and will probably order another pair for the gym specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Buff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty god grip on ground ,& on my feet wet or dry.
customer_reviews.text: These are marked size 7/8 and have 41 stamped on the bottom. Guess factory might have adjusted cause these fit much better on 6.5/7 feet. I bought the same about 2 summers ago ordered the same size & those where a tad bigger. Back then everybody recommended a size bigger to fit properly. They seem very lite & my old ones from 2 summers ago are still holding out.
customer_reviews.author: al adi

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for gym shower
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 11-12 size shoes and they are a little snug. I typically wear 11 or 12's so I figure this would be the best fit. But they are a little tight. They do however work great for what I ordered them for. I use them to wear to the pool / in the shower at the gym. They dry off fast and work great with water. If you looking for a pair for water purpose shoes I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: First, I DID NOT receive these at a reduced cost or free for a so-called "unbiased" review. These fit well and are very comfortable. As for sizing, I wear 8 1/2 EE and the 9/10 fit perfectly. Well made and a good sandal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lloydrs

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and have uses used them several days a week for a year in the gym shower and they work great! I wear a size 12W shoe and the 12/ 13 fits perfect. They are lightweight, well made, don't slip, and the water drains out perfectly. They dry out well with no odor buildup in my ventilated gym locker bag, which I leave in the car year round in VA.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyOne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, buy buy buy....would but another
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for deployment, came right before I left....great price, was a little short at first for my liking but as I wore into them they stretched to where they needed to be...very sturdy, able to walk everywhere with them...the little tag did start coming off a but because I did wear them IN the shower but they're still holding up....would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rae

customer_reviews.title: Okay but I will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are okay but not good enough to order again. The sizing is a little bit small but the real problem is that the soles are too soft. Immediately I could tell that the soles offered almost no protection from anything uncomfortable to step on. Within three weeks the soles were completely crushed and not cushioning at all.
customer_reviews.author: mattoleriver

customer_reviews.title: I went bigger like other posts said but were slightly too big sent ...
customer_reviews.text: I went bigger like other posts said but were slightly too big sent back and ordered smaller size and fit great also had a issue with the first order in that I got 2 right foot shoes and not a right and left but as they were too big anyway sent back the second order came perfect and now I just have to get used to wearing a sandle type shoe which I have never worn before. But great product and great company if I could give more then 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: gary george

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy; won't last long; get heavy and waterlogged very easily; bad for beach/pool
customer_reviews.text: These are basically kitchen sponges. They absorb even the slightest amount of water (just walking in dewy grass, for example), and they instantly become squeaky and squishy. They are useless for the beach, pool, or in the shower. They are so flimsy they feel like they will tear apart every time I slip them on. Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not perfect for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I got these for shower shoes. They are comfortable, and I much prefer slides to thong sandals. The soles are nicely cushioned and have shoe-type pattern for grip. These have no fabric or felt in them to hold moisture, so that's good. The only reason they are not 5 stars is the high rim around the edge, which holds your foot in place but traps everything inside until you shake it out - so they're not quite ideal for shower shoes, and they are terrible for sand. Best used for hanging around the pool, or something comfy to change into after taking off soccer or football spikes. These won't get all grungy from sweat or moisture or dirt.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave exposed to Sun
customer_reviews.text: I have bought couple of pairs of this slipper to wear on my hardwood floor. It provide good grip on foot and comfort. However, if you leave it exposed to Sun for couple of hours, it shrinks at least by one size and deforms badly. The material used is not like “rubber sole on tennis shoes”. It appears like polyurethane.. I threw away two pairs within within 2 months but keep one pair for my kid to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Youngsoo Ryu

customer_reviews.title: then I remembered how much I disliked them. I then started looking at this style
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at sandals, I then started looking flip-flops, then I remembered how much I disliked them. I then started looking at this style, nothing between my toes, the straps on top aid in holding my feet in place. The most important feature is, "I going to call in the inner sole", it is padded, has enough support, and lastly I like the way my feet sit down in the sole. The foot has side that are built up like shoes, aids in keeping the shoe on, I am not having to curl my toes up or down in order to keep them on. They are very comfortable, I will be buying again, and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5 shoes, and reviews said “true to size”. I ordered the size 9. I noticed the bottom of the slide ons show 43, which is size 10. I checked the tag on the bag the slide ons came in, and it says “Size 9/10”. I would not have ordered a different brand, if I known this is how they sell these slide ons!
customer_reviews.author: dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for the value.  Multiple use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of adidas sandals and these are much better in terms of comfort! These can double as shower sandals as they do not leave marks on a shower/tub surface. Very comfortable and my foot feels secure while walking. the "Vertico" Logo wore off on the top of the sandal, but since I use these outdoors and in the shower that was expected. Excellent value for price. Use everyday with no visible wear & tear as of 8/16/15. I havent noticed any stretching of the sandal materials due to odd foot placement & torque on the structure of the footwear. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: MoistGamer

customer_reviews.title: These things STINK! :(
customer_reviews.text: Horrendous chemical smell out of the bag. Terrible! YUCK!!! Even after multiple washing!!! :( I'll just put them out in the window and hope that in a couple of days the smell would go away. I wear a size 12, so I've ordered these 12-13 sandals, but I just barely able to put them on. Definitely NOT 13 max size! Rather, 11-12! Otherwise simple and OK, so just have to see how long will they last. But man, seriously, that smell is disgusting! :(
customer_reviews.author: MR.G.Top Contributor: Ham Radio

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Vertigo shower shoes. They run a bit small, and I could've kept them. But only with regrets. Last years pair were a bit small (8/9) and I sent them for exchange. However, the sales history doesn't reflect that I returned them for one size (9/10) larger, fitting perfectly. I made the same mistake this year. I had to return them for the (9/10) size. Might be helpful, keeping track of exchanged items that you like, and will reorder. Love these shower shoes, very comfortable, and they are appealing out catting around.
customer_reviews.author: Fenton Miller

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the dollar value here
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in April 2019 for a trip to Miami. They've since become a reliable pair of house shoes for me, what I wear while working from home or dipping around my community. I've worn them plenty and the only thing that has happened is the little branding tags on the top have come unglued and fallen off (I don't care about this at all). Dollar for dollar at $13, this was a nice return on my money for some reliable house slips.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a lot of problems with my feet, but I’m getting to the age where I feel like I probably should not walk around barefoot a lot. Especially on a hardwood floors like we have through our entire house. For 13 bucks. These are far better than I expected. As a matter of fact, I’m ordering another pair to have on hand just in case these are discontinued. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N. Whiteford

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, and good fit. I love that there's no fabric so they dry quickly. Super easy to slip on and off. Only complaint is that there are no drainage channels/holes, so they hold water while you're wearing them in the shower, like shallow bowls. So you end up standing in two tepid pools of your own filth and have to keep raising your feet to dump out the collected water. Annoying, but for the price it's tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Get a larger size
customer_reviews.text: The largest size is 12. I wear an 11.5. These are a bit too small. The materials will not allow stretching. I don't know how they will wear, but if you get a big enough size, they seem to be an ok sandal. They are shower sandals, if you try to do yard work with them, I don't think they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DaveP

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: They do the job of keeping your feet sanitary while in a public shower. The grip was fine, the only upgrade I wish they had was to be able to drain the water that collects in the shoe as it does have a lip that allows water to pool. I may rig them with a drill bit to create a few holes to let water drain later.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous no slip shower shoes.  Bottom has excellent grip.  Won't slip and slide on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: EXcellent shower shoes. Enough space for water to get to toes. Will not slide off. Excellent nonslip shower shoes. I would recommend them to anyone, especially someone who is leary about getting in the shower because of slipping and falling. I have to sit down and take them off. I leave them upside down in the shower to drain the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Clouser

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, perfect for around the house
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, perfect for around the house. Love the price, very reasonable. Sometimes when my tile floor gets wet it is slippery, don't have to worry with these shoes. Didn't think they would feel so good for the price, was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Dastugue

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smelling Slides
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the slides out of the bag I immediately smelled something toxic. The smell started giving me a headache. I thought they may need to be washed with soap to remove the smell, but after washing them with soap and water the smell was still there. I threw them away, because I did not trust such toxic smelling shoes on my skin. This is a good lesson in getting what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Lstan

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old set of Nike that finally took a dump and i disposed of. Not realizing that most of the new style of sliders have a cushioned top to them. I have to have a solid top as i go in and out of the water frequently when camping. These fit the bill perfectly. Good hold for your foot and easy to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley N.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these sandals as they are very comfortable and being a slide on very easy to put on. The only negative he found with these is the width is somewhat narrow, but since he liked them so much he went up one shoe size, which helped out with the width. After wearing them around the house, the width did widen somewhat as the rubber became more relaxed. He wears them and does recommend them, but unless you have a small foot you should order a shoe size up. Great price, very comfortable, and fast shipping.....the seller will also send you communication asking how you like the sandal which is definitely a plus also.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your sandal $$$
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar faciaittis so I can't walk around barefoot. Esp in hotel and gym locker rooms/showers. I needed inexpensive comfortable foot gear. These things are the best I've ever worn...regardless of price.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Overall Excellent Shower Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear the shoes daily, typically for several hours at a time (indoors and out). Length is true to size. Width is slightly wider than other shower shoes I've worn making the shoes slightly loose on my feet. The shoes feel soft and supportive under my feet, and they feel light and not heavy like some other shower shoes. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo Papa

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect!! Extremely comfortable!! It feels like I'm walking on air. I used these shower sandals at the beach once this summer. I plan on using them when I go away in October. Very good buy!! I never did followed up on these sandals. Its 09/2018 now. I used these sandals on my trip last October in the Dominican Republican. I did 2 big excursions involving water, mud, sand, dirt and more water. Super comfortable. Very durable. I will be using them next month (October) to DR again. Definitely a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: stability and a great piece of mind to take a shower without feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these slippers when I take a shower. I have muscular dystrophy and my balance has been very unstable. These slippers have given me confidence, stability and a great piece of mind to take a shower without feeling like I'm going to slip. They reinforce my footing even as the soap and water flow under my feet. I bought an extra pair for myself, and I just bought a pair for my father-in-law for Father's Day. He also was extremely happy with them as I was. I would recommend them to anyone who has a balance issue.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I both wear these. We like how you can slip in and out of them easily with or without socks as we come and go from outdoors to house. They are super marshmellowy soft so your feet float in them. The downside is the rubber wears a little faster than harder rubber. Never have had a smelly feet problem with these either like with some sandals.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Normal sizing was good for me. Love the shoes. =D
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. A little bit big but within normal range of shoes in general as everything is different. I typically wear 10 1/2 but I have shoes that are 9s and shoes that are 12s that all fit. haha. I got the 10/11s and they work well. I think if i went down a size they would probably be too small so at least in my case the sizing is on point. =)
customer_reviews.author: Micah B. Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Toes sit in a pool of water, they do not drain
customer_reviews.text: The way these sandals are shaped (cupped at the toes), they actually retain water, and your toes will constantly be immersed unless you make a conscious (and constant) effort to drain the shoe frequently. This might make the probability of contacting athletes foot worse, since your toes are constantly in water. I'm going back and looking for a pair of these type of sandals with drain holes. Thankfully, these were inexpensive so I don't feel so bad tossing them.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Too be very honest I have not used them yet. I am making a trip in March and plan on using them in place of your typical "flip flop". The flip flop I never have been comfortable with in walking on a casual trip. These looked very comfortable, therefore, bought them for just that. I will let you know about how it works out. Thank you for your reaching out to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Rx business account and private account

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY FEET!
customer_reviews.text: I basically live in these slides...I have been buying them for years and they hold up great. I am a 225lb 57 yr male and use them all around the house and yard..yes I even drive with them and go shopping too...they help keep my feet dry and happy during the summer...I buy a new pair every 6 months and use the old ones for the pool and mowing the lawn etc...hope they never stop making them or I would be lost!
customer_reviews.author: Capt. K

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals, but watch the size comments.  They do run true to size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and had to return them for a smaller pair. The other reviews indicated that they ran small, so I ordered the next size up. I returned them and re-ordered the appropriate size; they do run true to size. I wear a 9.5 and the 9/10 should fit just fine. They are a good quality sandal for a very low price. I will use them around the pool and around the gym, lockers, sauna and steam rooms. They may be OK for walking, but I did not buy them for that purpose. The replacement pair are perfect. Just order your normal size and you will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: RCAT

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool shoes, but akward sizing
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 12 shoes, so bought the 12/13, their largest size. Tight fit. Comfortable, easy on and off, non-slip. But when I walk my toes or heel hangs over shoe. Best feature: Their made for a single piece of rubber, so in the shower they fill up with water and soak the chlorine off your feet!!!
customer_reviews.author: great hands

customer_reviews.title: This size 12-13 is more like a 10-11
customer_reviews.text: Love the slipper style, the material it's made from and the basic design BUT the size is off, way off. I wear either a 10.5 or 11 depending on shoe brand and style so I ordered these larger (or so I thought). If the size was better I would've given these 4.5 or 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B. P. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandal for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I have inflammation in my metatarsal joints so I wear cushioned sandals all of the time around the house. These fit well and have enough cushion to keep my feet comfortable. I took the advice of a previous review and ordered the next larger size (12/13) for my size 12 feet. They fit quite well. As another reviewer mentioned, the cupped edges cause the water after a shower to stay in the sandal but that is easily dumped back into the tub, no big deal for me. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Smith

customer_reviews.title: If you want to walk with a puddle in your shoe, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in the shower. Because the shoe has sides, water does not escape and stays in the shoe. So after taking a shower or if you use these at a pool, you will take the shower with you. Very annoying. No way for the water to dry off either unless you take off the shoe, unlike other shower shoes which have holes at the bottom. Save your money and buy a proper shower shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: Vertico - Shower Sandals | Slide-On and Comfortable Pool-Side Shoes
feature_bullets: ADAPTIVE FOOTWEAR: Use our sandals at the pool, in a public shower, at the gym, or even for just walking around the block. Wherever your life’s journey takes you, you'll know that you're sandals can provide you with the best comfort and protection.

QUALITY MATERIALS: Unlike cheap pool and shower shoes that wear and tear after a couple of months, our sandals are made with high-quality materials that last much longer. We make the sole out of hard, waterproof rubber for extra comfort.

COMFORTABLE INSOLES: An outdoor shoe that doesn’t do a number on your feet after only a couple of hours. Our lightweight sandals are made with a soft but durable insole that feels like you’re laying your foot on a bed made of thin memory foam.

PROTECTION: It’s normal not to want to walk barefoot in a shower or lounge at the pool which thousands of people have already used. After so much use, it can be common for certain fungal germs to develop and infect you with warts or athlete's foot.

OPEN-TOE, SLIP-ON SANDALS: Our sandals come in a variety of sizes that can fit adolescent boys and older men. Simply slide them on and go about your day without worrying about them slipping off or coming loose.
